name: Fear Dead House VR
description:
Note: Compatible with Oculus Quest 1/2 only. Virtual Reality Game

' Fear Dead House '  is a game to explore paranormal activities. Open each possible door of a horror house and experience thrilling, scary paranormal activities. 

In the house of mystery, you will find and fall into the trap of ghosts. Flying chairs, scary zombies, crying doll, horror tv, dead bodies of the ghost, a flying skeleton who might attack you.  

You will have a torch to carry and explore in the dark death house. Face your fear to explore the whole dead house.
